page.title: 12CRADLEY HOME LIFE:GETTING UP
page.content: I woke up from a bad dream.I did not want to go back to sleep again so I looked at the clock, it was only 7.30a.m. past seven but I got up because I could not be bothered to wait until 8.00a.m.I peered through the door of my wardrobe,seeing what I could wear.Ah,a nice pair of jeans and a dotty t-shirt!But then mum came in and said "You're not wearing those jeans!They are so dirty and as for that T-shirt,it is too big for you!". "I noticed that,"I said. So instead,I picked out a warm woolly skirt and a woolly jumper because it was cold outside.I leaped down the stairs risking my life!As I was eating my "Harvest Crunch"I glanced at the clock it was already 8.00 a.m.
